metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
o Oil for frying  
• Instructions : 
o Mix grated cassava with coconut milk and salt.  
o Form mixture into flat cakes.  
o Fry in  hot oil until golden.  
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.  
 
Banchan  
• Ingredients : 
o Assorted small side dishes like pickled radish, spinach, bean sprouts, kimchi  
• Instructions : 
o Prepare each side dish separately.  
o Arrange on small plates.  
o Serve as accompaniments to the main meal.  
 
Banh Beo  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 cup rice flour  
o 1/2 cu

o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o Rosemary  
o Sea salt  
• Instructions : 
o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.  
o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixtur e and olive oil.  
o Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.  
o Press dough into a baking pan, dimple with fingers, and sprinkle with rosemary 
and sea salt.  
o Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 20 -25 minutes until golden.  
 
Freekeh Salad  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 cup freekeh  
o 2 cups water  
o 1 small onion
